name: Five Fighters
description:
-------Figure-------
Guan Yu: walk without holding a weapon, in unarmed combat, stunt tiger bashing.
Zhang Fei: walk without holding a weapon, unarmed combat, stunt for burst.
Zhao Yun: walking with sword action, most agile, stunt for or cut.
Huang Zhong: walking is the only holds a bow, long-range attack role, but not for melee, stunt for sky bow.
Wei Yan: walking billhook, stunt whirlwind leg.
-------Stage-------
Battle of Bowang: enemy general Li Dian, rifle, flying kick.
Battle of Bowang: enemy general Xiahou Dun, to bomb attacks, will fire and flying weight.
Xinye City: the enemy general Xu Chu, holding a hammer. Will wheel impact and flying weight.
Chibi: Kata Mimi, the United States was three, Meiling will
Shirakawa: enemy general Cao Ren, with sword and large meteor hammer.
Changbanpo War: the enemy general Chunyu guide. Hold the knife handle bimonthly.
The enemy will changban bridge: Yan Ming and lieutenant Xiahou Jie. Yan Ming with long knife, Xiahou Jie rifle. Yan Ming's attack can send shock waves, but also the collision of the wheel.
